name: BridgeKeeper- bridge card game
description: BridgeKeeper is a tablet app to provide an interactive interface for bridge card players. Players can use the game table simulated in the app to complete bidding process. The app will record bidding history and keep tracking game rotation. When a game is completed, player will only need to enter game result and big card points, BridgeKeeper will calculate score for each individual game and then convert into International Match Point (IMP).
